reference.shortdesc: A result describes the expected outcome for the task as a whole.

section.title: Usage information
section.note: To describe the outcome of a specific step, use the stepresult element instead.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The result element is specialized from section. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <task id="sqlj"> <title>Creating an SQLJ file</title> <taskbody> <context>Once you have set up SQLJ, you need to create a new SQLJ file. You cannot add #sqlj statements directly in the Source pane of the Workbench.</context> ... <result>The SQLJ file is successfully created when the SQLJ server displays the "File Created" dialog.</result> </taskbody> </task>
